name: Chaos Ground
description:
This Game is a kinda Strategic game where you can unleash the force of Chaos on the battlefield.

This game is part of a one week challenge game, this is the second one of the series and I also took part of the Brakeys Game Jam for this project, the theme was: Let there be Chaos.

It has local coop too tough it's not very clean, don't expect too much.

 Go check out my Youtube Channel if you want to see the upcomming one and more: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC2XwtnNWxr-UE7oLameDlDQ

I look forward on cleaning up the project quite a bit by adding some new features and audio, also polishing some things in the game, sorry if the current state of the game is not very great.
